109.sentence_2: To be safest <as you pack>, just assume that everything you bring is going to get wet.
109.context_before: At the very least, aim to drink 16oz or more of water in the hour leading up to your swim. Stuff phones, electronics, and valuables in resealable plastic bags.
109.context_after: If you are taking things like your mobile phone that can't get wet, take them in a separate small bag, pockets of your clothes or a waterproof bag which you can put in your swimming bag.
